value:
I am so bored. Isn't there any good
shopping around here?!

I'm Lady Camilla's retainer. She
only dotes on me because I'm
strong and cute. I gotta maintain!

Look at you, patrolling! I like it.
You're taking a page right outta
MY book!

You're bored too, huh? You should
show me around this place. It's
my third world I've ever—$k$pWait, no! Just kidding. Two!
Just two. Heh.

I know I'm pretty fierce, but I've got
to look great too. Hair that looks THIS
good takes a lot of combing!

I've come with a hello from
$Nf.$k$pSo, there you go.
I'm not average. I deserve better!
Bah. Not good enough for me.
This isn't like me!
Thanks for looking out for me.

I'm Selena, a mercenary who works
for Nohr. Very talented. Ask anyone!
They'll say I'm cute too. Bonus!

Ah, THERE you are! Hey, do you
want to form a team with me?
I mean, we already hang out...$k$pGreat! We are now the
Selen$Nu
Alliance!$k$pWhy are you making that face?!
It does NOT sound dumb!$k$pI'll have you know I put A LOT of
time and effort into that name so
we could become closer friends!$k$pHuh? Oh, well, that's better.
I knew you'd come around. Now
that we're a team, no secrets!$k$pMy name's not Selena, and I'm
not from the world you found me in.
You can call me Severa...privately.
せやっ！
はああっ！
きゃあっ！
Gimme a break!
Time to play!
Loser!
Let's get this over with.
I've had enough!
Not fair...
Heh
How's my hair looking today? Good enough? Hope so.
I'll be the best in your whole group. It's just a matter of time.
Nice to have a role model, right? I've got the best one ever.
The uniforms those Order of Heroes people wear... They're so cute!
You keep an eye out for any good clothing stores, OK?
I hate it whenever I'm separated from Lady Camilla.
Hey. If you need my help, ask. Not like I like you or anything.
Yeah?
Where to?
On it.
